column5: I am heading for lac seul tomorrow so last night I jacked up my trailer to check the wheel bearings and check tire pressure. I found out that 2 of the 4 hubs on my trailer had bearings that were shot, so its been a busy day replacing all the bearings and making sure its good to go, It is my fault to wait till the last minute, but for the last 10 years I have been doing the same routine and always had good grease and was good to go. I am very thankfull to catch this before the trek. I will post a report from lac seul.
Good for you..glad you caught that before you hit the road..have safe travels and have a great trip..

Glad you got those bearing fixed now! Every year we see trailers along the side of the road, I can't think of anything worse than being so close to the promised land than to have the trip compromised by a trailer problem. Have a great trip!!
